wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Richard Bradshaw,  (born 15 February 1944) is a British academic, specialising in social policy, poverty and child welfare. He is Professor Emeritus of Social Policy at the University of York and a part-time Professor of Social Policy at Durham University. Since 2013, he has served as chairman of the policy committee of Child Poverty Action Group.

response: Bradshaw's brother is Jonathan Bradshaw, CBE, Professor Emeritus of Social Policy at the University of York.
* 2007: Jonathan Bradshaw; Hilary Land; Alan Walker.
*Professor Jonathan Bradshaw, for services to child poverty.
